title: 【求解】 1.9.4中summon 召唤物的手持掉率问题
author: aqa6612120

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
←_←你怎么样这样写啊
10%
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone_sword",Count:1},{}],HandDropChances:[0.1F,0F]}复制代码
50%
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone_sword",Count:1},{}],HandDropChances:[0.5F,0F]}复制代码
100%
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone_sword",Count:1},{}],HandDropChances:[2F,0F]}复制代码

replies.author: jimmy1234
